curam.util.administration.intf
Interface PropertyAdmin

All Known Implementing Classes:
curam.util.administration.base.PropertyAdmin
Direct Known Subclasses:
PropertyAdminFactory
public abstract class PropertyAdmin
extends curam.util.administration.base.PropertyAdmin

The Properties Management Administration interface. Properties are internally stored in a cache that can be updated using the publishPropertyChanges function.

public void publishPropertyChanges()
                            throws AppException,
                                   DatabaseException,
                                   InformationalException,
                                   AppRuntimeException
Publish any changes to the Property cache.

Throws:
AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.
AppRuntimeException - RUN_ID_PROPERTY_CACHE_LOAD_FAILURE - if the property cache could not be loaded.
AppRuntimeException - if a naming exception occurs
AppRuntimeException - RUN_ID_ERR_JMS_MESSAGE_SEND_FAILED - if the JMS service reported any errors while trying to send the message.
AppRuntimeException - RUN_ID_ERR_JMS_MESSAGE_CREATION_FAILED - if message creation fails due to an internal error in the JMS service.

Returns:

AppException - ID_PROPERTY_WITH_NAME_EXISTS - if a property with the same name exists.

Parameters:
key - The property description key.
